summary: An earthquake of magnitude 4.0 hit Delhi and its adjoining National Capital Region (NCR) on Monday morning. According to the National Centre of Seismology, the quake hit at a depth of about 5 km. Prime Minister Narendra Modi has urged the residents of Delhi and nearby areas to stay calm and follow safety precautions. Delhi Police have urged citizens to call the emergency 112 helpline for help.

Royal Challengers Bengaluru beat Delhi Capitals by eight wickets. Smriti Mandhana top scored for Bengaluru with 81 runs. DC were bowled out for just 141 in 19.3 overs. Rajat Patidar and Will Jacks scored 62 runs each for RCB and Bengaluru.

4.0 magnitude earthquake hit the Delhi-NCR region at around 5:36 AM. The epicentre of the earthquake was in New Delhi near Durgabai Deshmukh College of Special Education in Dhaula Kuan. Videos showed the ground and buildings shaking, forcing people to rush out of their homes. Prime Minister Narendra Modi took to social media to raise concerns and urged residents to stay alert for any aftershocks.

The Vivo V50 is a repurposed version of the company's popular V40 smartphone. The V50 has a larger battery, a more durable design, and enhanced features tailored for wedding photography. It is the first smartphone in India to feature 3D Star technology, making it look unlike anything I have seen.

Brazilian authorities said a young man from an isolated Indigenous tribe who approached a riverine community in Brazil’s Amazon returned voluntarily to his people less than 24 hours later. Britain and Sweden have become the first European nations to say they could send troops to help secure Ukraine after an end to the war there.

Vicky Kaushal and Rashima Mandanna starrer 'Chhaava' is ruling the box office. The movie had a tremendous opening collecting over 31 crores on the first day of its release. With each passing day, Chhaava is making new records. The period drama crossed the Rs 100 crore mark in the first three days.

Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT) in Odisha, India, has ordered all Nepali students to leave the university over a dispute following the suspicious death of a Nepali student studying at the university. Prakriti Lamsal, a third-year B.Tech student from Butwal, reportedly took her own life on Sunday after enduring persistent harassment from an Indian student. Tension ran high after the varsity authorities asked all international students from Nepal to vacate the campus immediately.

Philadelphia Police Department is investigating a shooting that happened near the Eagles Super Bowl Parade that left two women injured. Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear provides update on deadly flooding, and ongoing weather concerns. At least 11 people have died due to the catastrophic flooding in the area.

Narendra Modi is an Indian politician and government official who rose to become a senior leader of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) In 2014 he led his party to victory in elections to the Lok Sabha (lower chamber of the Indian parliament), after which he was sworn in as prime minister of India. Modi was raised in a small town in northern Gujarat, and he completed an M.A degree in political science from Gujarat University in Ahmedabad.

The BYD Sealion 7 is an electric SUV with a coupe-like roofline. The carmaker now accepts bookings for the car with deliveries starting on 7 March, 2025. This is the fourth EV from the carmaker and joins the Atto 3, Seal, and eMax MPV in the Indian market. The Sealion 07 EV was first introduced on 17 November 2023 at the 2023 Guangzhou Auto Show. It was launched at the 2024 Beijing Auto Show in April 2024.

First glimpse of Sivakarthikeyan-starrer and AR Murugadoss’ directorial ‘Madharasi’ was unveiled on Monday. The makers of the much-awaited explosive action entertainer on Monday announced the title of the film as <i>Madharasi. The film was, until now, being tentatively referred to as #SKXARM. The 44-second action-packed teaser showcases intense fight sequences.

Guillain-Barre syndrome is a condition in which the body's immune system attacks the nerves. Weakness and tingling in the hands and feet are usually the first symptoms. These sensations can quickly spread and may lead to paralysis. Most people with the condition need treatment in a hospital. Two types of treatments can speed recovery and reduce symptoms.

The Tuono 457 is a naked version of Aprilia's RS 457 sportbike. It will be available in Puma Grey of the Piranha Red colorway and priced at $6599. The Tuono is priced at Rs 3.95 lakh(showroom) and will go on sale in April 2025.

The 18th edition of the prestigious tournament will commence on March 22, 2025 and the Final will be played on May 25, 2025. The season opener will be between the defending champions Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) and Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) at Eden Gardens. This season’s 74 matches will be hosted at 13 venues over 65 action-packed days. The first of the 12 double-headers day will take place on March 23, 2025 as Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) face Rajasthan Royals (RRH) in an afternoon game.

The New Delhi railway station (station code: NDLS[1]) is the primary railway hub for the Indian capital, New Delhi, and an integral part of Indian Railways. The station features 16 platforms with entrances at Paharganj (platform 1) and Ajmeri Gate (platform 16) It is among the busiest railway stations in India, handling a high frequency of trains and substantial passenger traffic on a daily basis. On average, the station experiences a daily footfall of approximately 500,000 passengers.

Many of the victims were Hindu pilgrims who were traveling to the Maha Kumbh festival in Prayagraj in northern India. The incident occurred after some passengers slipped and fell on others while coming down from a footbridge that connects train platforms. The Central Reserve Police Force (CRPF) and Delhi Police were deployed at New Delhi Railway Station on Monday to control the crowd.

California experienced a higher-than-usual number of fires this year. Total acreage burned remains slightly below the five-year average but exceeds last year's figures. Forecasts indicate that above-normal temperatures and below-normal precipitation will persist through February, sustaining elevated fire risk.

Vicky Kaushal and Rashima Mandanna starrer 'Chhaava' is ruling the box office. The movie had a tremendous opening collecting over 31 crores on the first day of its release. With each passing day, Chhaava is making new records. The period drama crossed the Rs 100 crore mark in the first three days.

New Zealand beat Pakistan by five wickets in the final of the tri-nation series in Karachi. Chasing 243 to win, New Zealand achieved the target in just 45.2 overs. Captain Mohammad Rizwan and vice-captain Salman Ali Agha were once again the top run-scorers for the hosts, notching up 46 and 45 respectively. Late cameos from Tayyab Tahir, Faheem Ashraf and Naseem Shah helped Pakistan post 242. Pakistan and New Zealand will face off five days later again, on February 19, in the opening game of the Champions Trophy.

Valentine's Day originated as a Christian feast day honoring a martyr named Valentine. In 18th-century England, it grew into an occasion for couples to express their love for each other. In Italy, Saint Valentine's keys are given to lovers "as a romantic symbol and an invitation to unlock the giver's heart"
